actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the waiver of certain grounds for exclusion and deportation from the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to waive the deportation of an alien whose deportation is based solely upon his conviction for the illicit possession of marihuana, and who is otherwise admissible into the United States. (Amends 8 U.S.C. 1182(a)(23), 1251(a)(11))

titles.title: A bill to provide for the waiver of certain grounds for exclusion and deportation from the United States.
